mdBlocks.parent: ここでは活動で使用するツールである**Gitのインストール**と**Githubのアカウント登録**をする方法を説明します。
## Gitのインストール
### 1. インストーラーのダウンロード
Git公式サイト（[https://gitforwindows.org/?_fsi=LfoGMNmY](https://gitforwindows.org/?_fsi=LfoGMNmY)）にアクセスしてください。 Downloadボタンをクリックしてください。

![%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%83%E3%83%88_2024-11-05_14.19.19.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/f9e367dd-1db7-428f-a2ed-c68a46952d5a/ef24dd58-7dc7-45b9-b5bd-e50f9cd2fa59/%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%83%E3%83%88_2024-11-05_14.19.19.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466YQQMFTIN%2F20250226%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250226T063730Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjEB4aCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJGMEQCIHuCluVyZXD4FEavYsDPsjjydZFuBHkETOh1vZcWzYLiAiAzvUQtNRn%2BmiNr5sUqo7KAFb4xwFvHVZn%2FDk7z4HFN3ir%2FAwhXEAAaDDYzNzQyMzE4MzgwNSIMdtjawWlOT066iiMOKtwDLQ9SU3kjxU9O5267uOOX53jfJbYCvVfpQHCa8oKc%2BTCy1qA5Puczk37WvireJTFZ9W53G37bRbe32m1xyvIqvwOJ38ZucZpxVvO1X0r0HKNBHpPrASNmlPGShwj37SVsSQDvYSVbgxxu6BYZZI%2BpNSd5GLeWXLu%2B54l5RkWBDxOQTeCHT0DlCgDx3VIxIjz6dLixgwMn7qR9Yae0kSD22pzXx4dIJ2pUDvrWdjw7Um8V8%2F3LFDLIXF5Cc0Vv35mJOJLxBcR%2FhkD%2BAAY1OsBLwcXo7pdqtJz9dOLYTHZO4D1bbnQKl7hOjehnOs4MfSDjlQxIs7jdyfB4W3bgNFsKeQhxPMW4akAFlHul9RNmh1KxzzDcYjK9OpktVFBS7UGTcgcNwplv4AeWJLHFqEBagy%2B%2Fb6o8hSFkGXHUYNCpeiNdxNUQUbixlD1LHFzai%2FlLvuk%2BAXO%2FS58jIVouCIGTTI85h6NmkH6BLp%2FLyy3KNnqYM8ltj%2Bm9V16QJIEvhTrnU3sTBasCDJ%2By0sN%2FRdv%2BzutimG9KSqOwTKNc%2FYFUSU0SNFZLsW0eFmdMfVsXwoUNJGiI7BueWM1gmfTvXnELzY4Ddo61iODUVOi8rCQuZJrhjJ3Ae7zcYlie5rgwheP6vQY6pgHKOBGz87WLM1JX9rROwwcFj2IUlBSf6ylIKOSmWtNX7Ah%2FJFKIVDlvizPoSUGR%2Bxg%2FXk%2FiJJ1%2B8ouQZ4aHTJLO9p7MZPukrEDaMqtz24zH0RYE5EPJzvCDzKKbiZ42oJTPqIikIdPkRKMOVXWYmbkNSGTk%2BhA6Z49GVTlH7QIwaTC%2BrERo0suoC90lqLj50cBQlBSn%2Fu5nXja9mQwXj2bnsDU8CHqc&X-Amz-Signature=ffec8feaa1596b737506f475b0d2b89b264588f12adb9739dfac3c433e7bebe6&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
Gitのインストーラーがダウンロードされます。（※数分かかります）

![%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%83%E3%83%88_2024-11-05_14.24.48.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/f9e367dd-1db7-428f-a2ed-c68a46952d5a/79573433-f039-4aca-9f94-d45271b62a25/%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%83%E3%83%88_2024-11-05_14.24.48.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466YQQMFTIN%2F20250226%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250226T063730Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjEB4aCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJGMEQCIHuCluVyZXD4FEavYsDPsjjydZFuBHkETOh1vZcWzYLiAiAzvUQtNRn%2BmiNr5sUqo7KAFb4xwFvHVZn%2FDk7z4HFN3ir%2FAwhXEAAaDDYzNzQyMzE4MzgwNSIMdtjawWlOT066iiMOKtwDLQ9SU3kjxU9O5267uOOX53jfJbYCvVfpQHCa8oKc%2BTCy1qA5Puczk37WvireJTFZ9W53G37bRbe32m1xyvIqvwOJ38ZucZpxVvO1X0r0HKNBHpPrASNmlPGShwj37SVsSQDvYSVbgxxu6BYZZI%2BpNSd5GLeWXLu%2B54l5RkWBDxOQTeCHT0DlCgDx3VIxIjz6dLixgwMn7qR9Yae0kSD22pzXx4dIJ2pUDvrWdjw7Um8V8%2F3LFDLIXF5Cc0Vv35mJOJLxBcR%2FhkD%2BAAY1OsBLwcXo7pdqtJz9dOLYTHZO4D1bbnQKl7hOjehnOs4MfSDjlQxIs7jdyfB4W3bgNFsKeQhxPMW4akAFlHul9RNmh1KxzzDcYjK9OpktVFBS7UGTcgcNwplv4AeWJLHFqEBagy%2B%2Fb6o8hSFkGXHUYNCpeiNdxNUQUbixlD1LHFzai%2FlLvuk%2BAXO%2FS58jIVouCIGTTI85h6NmkH6BLp%2FLyy3KNnqYM8ltj%2Bm9V16QJIEvhTrnU3sTBasCDJ%2By0sN%2FRdv%2BzutimG9KSqOwTKNc%2FYFUSU0SNFZLsW0eFmdMfVsXwoUNJGiI7BueWM1gmfTvXnELzY4Ddo61iODUVOi8rCQuZJrhjJ3Ae7zcYlie5rgwheP6vQY6pgHKOBGz87WLM1JX9rROwwcFj2IUlBSf6ylIKOSmWtNX7Ah%2FJFKIVDlvizPoSUGR%2Bxg%2FXk%2FiJJ1%2B8ouQZ4aHTJLO9p7MZPukrEDaMqtz24zH0RYE5EPJzvCDzKKbiZ42oJTPqIikIdPkRKMOVXWYmbkNSGTk%2BhA6Z49GVTlH7QIwaTC%2BrERo0suoC90lqLj50cBQlBSn%2Fu5nXja9mQwXj2bnsDU8CHqc&X-Amz-Signature=a512130ce13960155be11e60d3ea2ec67067e359d791e113b2ad211d782479e8&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
### ２. インストール
ダウンロードしたインストーラーをダブルクリックして起動しましょう。

![%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%83%E3%83%88_2024-11-05_14.26.37.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/f9e367dd-1db7-428f-a2ed-c68a46952d5a/adee1e38-a96e-487d-9d4c-9279202d7dc0/%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%83%E3%83%88_2024-11-05_14.26.37.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466YQQMFTIN%2F20250226%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250226T063730Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjEB4aCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJGMEQCIHuCluVyZXD4FEavYsDPsjjydZFuBHkETOh1vZcWzYLiAiAzvUQtNRn%2BmiNr5sUqo7KAFb4xwFvHVZn%2FDk7z4HFN3ir%2FAwhXEAAaDDYzNzQyMzE4MzgwNSIMdtjawWlOT066iiMOKtwDLQ9SU3kjxU9O5267uOOX53jfJbYCvVfpQHCa8oKc%2BTCy1qA5Puczk37WvireJTFZ9W53G37bRbe32m1xyvIqvwOJ38ZucZpxVvO1X0r0HKNBHpPrASNmlPGShwj37SVsSQDvYSVbgxxu6BYZZI%2BpNSd5GLeWXLu%2B54l5RkWBDxOQTeCHT0DlCgDx3VIxIjz6dLixgwMn7qR9Yae0kSD22pzXx4dIJ2pUDvrWdjw7Um8V8%2F3LFDLIXF5Cc0Vv35mJOJLxBcR%2FhkD%2BAAY1OsBLwcXo7pdqtJz9dOLYTHZO4D1bbnQKl7hOjehnOs4MfSDjlQxIs7jdyfB4W3bgNFsKeQhxPMW4akAFlHul9RNmh1KxzzDcYjK9OpktVFBS7UGTcgcNwplv4AeWJLHFqEBagy%2B%2Fb6o8hSFkGXHUYNCpeiNdxNUQUbixlD1LHFzai%2FlLvuk%2BAXO%2FS58jIVouCIGTTI85h6NmkH6BLp%2FLyy3KNnqYM8ltj%2Bm9V16QJIEvhTrnU3sTBasCDJ%2By0sN%2FRdv%2BzutimG9KSqOwTKNc%2FYFUSU0SNFZLsW0eFmdMfVsXwoUNJGiI7BueWM1gmfTvXnELzY4Ddo61iODUVOi8rCQuZJrhjJ3Ae7zcYlie5rgwheP6vQY6pgHKOBGz87WLM1JX9rROwwcFj2IUlBSf6ylIKOSmWtNX7Ah%2FJFKIVDlvizPoSUGR%2Bxg%2FXk%2FiJJ1%2B8ouQZ4aHTJLO9p7MZPukrEDaMqtz24zH0RYE5EPJzvCDzKKbiZ42oJTPqIikIdPkRKMOVXWYmbkNSGTk%2BhA6Z49GVTlH7QIwaTC%2BrERo0suoC90lqLj50cBQlBSn%2Fu5nXja9mQwXj2bnsDU8CHqc&X-Amz-Signature=4b7a35ca25a032244793bc158dad75f9a98507edfe8acb21079bb639c3a852a1&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
あとは「Next」ボタンを押し続けてインストーラーをすすめ、最後の画面で「Install」ボタンをクリックして下さい。（設定値を変更する必要はありません。）
## GitHubアカウント登録
GitHub公式サイト（[https://github.com/](https://github.com/)）にアクセスしてください。
「Sign up for GitHub」をクリックしてください。

![%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%83%E3%83%88_2024-11-05_14.31.39.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/f9e367dd-1db7-428f-a2ed-c68a46952d5a/23992aab-7e58-481d-b855-79492cbb9db8/%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%83%E3%83%88_2024-11-05_14.31.39.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466YQQMFTIN%2F20250226%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250226T063730Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjEB4aCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJGMEQCIHuCluVyZXD4FEavYsDPsjjydZFuBHkETOh1vZcWzYLiAiAzvUQtNRn%2BmiNr5sUqo7KAFb4xwFvHVZn%2FDk7z4HFN3ir%2FAwhXEAAaDDYzNzQyMzE4MzgwNSIMdtjawWlOT066iiMOKtwDLQ9SU3kjxU9O5267uOOX53jfJbYCvVfpQHCa8oKc%2BTCy1qA5Puczk37WvireJTFZ9W53G37bRbe32m1xyvIqvwOJ38ZucZpxVvO1X0r0HKNBHpPrASNmlPGShwj37SVsSQDvYSVbgxxu6BYZZI%2BpNSd5GLeWXLu%2B54l5RkWBDxOQTeCHT0DlCgDx3VIxIjz6dLixgwMn7qR9Yae0kSD22pzXx4dIJ2pUDvrWdjw7Um8V8%2F3LFDLIXF5Cc0Vv35mJOJLxBcR%2FhkD%2BAAY1OsBLwcXo7pdqtJz9dOLYTHZO4D1bbnQKl7hOjehnOs4MfSDjlQxIs7jdyfB4W3bgNFsKeQhxPMW4akAFlHul9RNmh1KxzzDcYjK9OpktVFBS7UGTcgcNwplv4AeWJLHFqEBagy%2B%2Fb6o8hSFkGXHUYNCpeiNdxNUQUbixlD1LHFzai%2FlLvuk%2BAXO%2FS58jIVouCIGTTI85h6NmkH6BLp%2FLyy3KNnqYM8ltj%2Bm9V16QJIEvhTrnU3sTBasCDJ%2By0sN%2FRdv%2BzutimG9KSqOwTKNc%2FYFUSU0SNFZLsW0eFmdMfVsXwoUNJGiI7BueWM1gmfTvXnELzY4Ddo61iODUVOi8rCQuZJrhjJ3Ae7zcYlie5rgwheP6vQY6pgHKOBGz87WLM1JX9rROwwcFj2IUlBSf6ylIKOSmWtNX7Ah%2FJFKIVDlvizPoSUGR%2Bxg%2FXk%2FiJJ1%2B8ouQZ4aHTJLO9p7MZPukrEDaMqtz24zH0RYE5EPJzvCDzKKbiZ42oJTPqIikIdPkRKMOVXWYmbkNSGTk%2BhA6Z49GVTlH7QIwaTC%2BrERo0suoC90lqLj50cBQlBSn%2Fu5nXja9mQwXj2bnsDU8CHqc&X-Amz-Signature=12735de05b175628c612ec5d6b26002b9fd866f3e58c274ae151f4596fce3108&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)

Sign up画面でメールアドレスとパスワードとユーザーネームを登録してください。
Email preferences項目のチェックボックスはチェックする必要はないです（不定期に製品の更新情報やお知らせを受け取るかどうかという項目）。
画面遷移したら「検証する」をクリックしてください。ロボットによる登録でないことを証明するため、画面の指示に従って進めてください。

![%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%83%E3%83%88_2024-11-05_14.36.37.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/f9e367dd-1db7-428f-a2ed-c68a46952d5a/1173f44b-f803-4554-8c41-235a3d38cf48/%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%83%E3%83%88_2024-11-05_14.36.37.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466YQQMFTIN%2F20250226%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250226T063730Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjEB4aCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJGMEQCIHuCluVyZXD4FEavYsDPsjjydZFuBHkETOh1vZcWzYLiAiAzvUQtNRn%2BmiNr5sUqo7KAFb4xwFvHVZn%2FDk7z4HFN3ir%2FAwhXEAAaDDYzNzQyMzE4MzgwNSIMdtjawWlOT066iiMOKtwDLQ9SU3kjxU9O5267uOOX53jfJbYCvVfpQHCa8oKc%2BTCy1qA5Puczk37WvireJTFZ9W53G37bRbe32m1xyvIqvwOJ38ZucZpxVvO1X0r0HKNBHpPrASNmlPGShwj37SVsSQDvYSVbgxxu6BYZZI%2BpNSd5GLeWXLu%2B54l5RkWBDxOQTeCHT0DlCgDx3VIxIjz6dLixgwMn7qR9Yae0kSD22pzXx4dIJ2pUDvrWdjw7Um8V8%2F3LFDLIXF5Cc0Vv35mJOJLxBcR%2FhkD%2BAAY1OsBLwcXo7pdqtJz9dOLYTHZO4D1bbnQKl7hOjehnOs4MfSDjlQxIs7jdyfB4W3bgNFsKeQhxPMW4akAFlHul9RNmh1KxzzDcYjK9OpktVFBS7UGTcgcNwplv4AeWJLHFqEBagy%2B%2Fb6o8hSFkGXHUYNCpeiNdxNUQUbixlD1LHFzai%2FlLvuk%2BAXO%2FS58jIVouCIGTTI85h6NmkH6BLp%2FLyy3KNnqYM8ltj%2Bm9V16QJIEvhTrnU3sTBasCDJ%2By0sN%2FRdv%2BzutimG9KSqOwTKNc%2FYFUSU0SNFZLsW0eFmdMfVsXwoUNJGiI7BueWM1gmfTvXnELzY4Ddo61iODUVOi8rCQuZJrhjJ3Ae7zcYlie5rgwheP6vQY6pgHKOBGz87WLM1JX9rROwwcFj2IUlBSf6ylIKOSmWtNX7Ah%2FJFKIVDlvizPoSUGR%2Bxg%2FXk%2FiJJ1%2B8ouQZ4aHTJLO9p7MZPukrEDaMqtz24zH0RYE5EPJzvCDzKKbiZ42oJTPqIikIdPkRKMOVXWYmbkNSGTk%2BhA6Z49GVTlH7QIwaTC%2BrERo0suoC90lqLj50cBQlBSn%2Fu5nXja9mQwXj2bnsDU8CHqc&X-Amz-Signature=e26aed763961998f2f0f6d014a894f66766bd7e8e498076878b73c0228a9eade&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
画面が遷移したら、登録したメールアドレス宛のメールに記載されたコードを入力してください。
